dataIdInfo.idAbs: Riverscapes is a collaboration between Utah State University, North Arrow Research, South Fork Research, Eco Logical Research, and the Piegay Lab in Lyon. This tool creates a new Riverscapes project XML file and directory structure, which will store information about the inputs and outputs associated with tool runs.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Kelly Whitehead, Jesse Langdon, South Fork Research, Inc.

tool.name: NewGNATProject

param.name: projectFolder
param.dialogReference: A local folder or directory where the Riverscapes project XML file, and data inputs and outputs, will be stored.

param.name: boolNewFolder
param.dialogReference: Indicates if this is a new project folder.

param.name: metaRegion
param.dialogReference: Defaults to CRB, i.e. Columbia River Basin.

param.name: metaWatershed
param.dialogReference: Name of the drainage area encompassing the project. Please select from the list of 10-digit hydrologic unit codes (HUC 5).

tool.summary: Riverscapes is a collaboration between Utah State University, North Arrow Research, South Fork Research, Eco Logical Research, and the Piegay Lab in Lyon. This tool creates a new Riverscapes project XML file and directory structure, which will store information about the inputs and outputs associated with tool runs.
